privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your information when you use our services. It also explains your privacy rights and legal protections. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of your information as described in this policy.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: Account: A unique account created to access our services.
Affiliate: An entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with another party.
Application: EngoyGames software provided by the company.
Company: Daleel User Technology Solutions, Sole Proprietorship and EngoyGames E-Transaction LLC.
Cookies: Small files placed on your device by a website to store your browsing history.
Country: Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.
Device: Any device that can access the service (e.g., computer, mobile phone, tablet).
Personal Data: Information that relates to an identified individual.
Service: Refers to the application or website, or both.
Service Provider: Any legal entity that processes data on behalf of the company.
Usage Data: Data collected automatically when using the service.
Website: EngoyGames accessible at EngoyGames website.
You: The individual accessing or using the service.

collection.title: Collection and Use of Your Personal Data

types.title: Types of Data Collected
mobile: Mobile device type and unique ID

tracking.title: Tracking Technologies and Cookies
tracking.cookiesIntro: We use cookies and similar technologies to monitor activity on our service and store certain information. The technologies we use include:
cookiesDetails: Enhancing user experience: Cookies help remember your preferences, allowing us to tailor our services to your needs.
Usage analysis: Cookies provide insights into how our website is used, helping us improve our service and user experience.
You can refuse cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect some parts of our service.
tracking.cloudflare: We use Cloudflare to enhance security and performance of our website. Cloudflare may use cookies and other technologies to collect and store information such as IP address, browser type and version, and time zone settings. Cloudflare helps ensure speed, security, and reliability for our users.

usage.title: Use of Your Personal Data
list: Contact you with updates and promotional information
Other purposes such as data analysis and service improvement

retention.title: Retention and Transfer of Your Personal Data
retention.text: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy, including legal compliance. Data may be transferred to computers outside your jurisdiction with appropriate safeguards.

deletion.title: Deletion and Disclosure of Your Personal Data
deletion.text: You have the right to delete or request assistance in deleting your personal data. We may retain some information when required by law. Personal data may also be disclosed for legal requirements.

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.text: While we strive to protect your data, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

children.title: Children’s Privacy
children.text: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you become aware that your child has provided personal data to us, please contact us to remove it.

externalLinks.title: Links to Other Websites
externalLinks.text: We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party websites.

updates.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
updates.text: We may update this policy and will notify you via email. The updated policy becomes effective once posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: For any inquiries about this Privacy Policy, you can reach us:

refundPolicy.title: Refund Policy
refundPolicy.intro: Although we strive for your complete satisfaction with your purchases of our digital products, you may sometimes need to know our refund policy. This policy explains all the information you need to know in this regard.
steps: Due to the nature of digital products (cards, codes, e-vouchers), all sales are considered final and non-refundable or non-exchangeable after the purchase is completed and the code is delivered to the customer.
EngoyGames or its affiliated companies bear no responsibility for incorrect purchases you made due to your negligence or entering false/incorrect information.

Refund requests are only considered if there is a proven technical defect in the code itself that prevents proper use, provided that this defect originates from the company issuing the original card and not from misuse by the customer or issues related to the platform where the code is being used.

If the customer chooses a refund to the original bank card used for payment, a service fee of up to 3.5% of the refunded order value will be deducted. Please note that the bank refund process may take between 24 hours and 5 business days and is subject to the policies of different banks and payment gateways, and EngoyGames is not responsible for delays caused by these entities.

After receiving your order, EngoyGames is not responsible for any loss or damage to the purchased digital product. EngoyGames is not responsible for used or stolen codes after proper delivery, or expired codes whose expiration date was clear at the time of purchase.

EngoyGames reserves the right to change, modify, add, or remove parts of this refund and exchange policy at any time without prior notice. Changes take effect immediately upon posting on the website or app. Please review this policy periodically to keep up with updates. Continued use of the website or app after posting changes constitutes your full acceptance of these changes.
refundPolicy.needHelpTitle: Having an issue with your order?
refundPolicy.needHelpText: We do our best to ensure the validity and functionality of products, and if you encounter any problem with your order, please contact our customer support team.

termsOfUse.title: EngoyGames Terms of Use
termsOfUse.intro: Welcome to "EngoyGames". These terms and conditions apply to your use of the website or app. By entering and using EngoyGames, you fully agree to these terms and conditions.

userAccount.title: User Account
items: Registration and Login: Using certain features may require creating a user account. Accounts are created and logged in using the customer's phone number, verified via a code sent to that number. You are responsible for providing accurate information, including ensuring your phone can receive the verification code.

Account Security: You are fully responsible for keeping your registered phone number secure and the verification codes private. You must prevent unauthorized access and report any unauthorized use immediately.
Personal Use: The user account is for personal use only and cannot be transferred or shared.
Suspension Right: EngoyGames reserves the right to suspend or deactivate your account if you violate these terms or site policies, at management's discretion.

orders.title: Orders and Purchases
items: Order Acceptance: EngoyGames reserves the right not to approve any order at its discretion for reasons including, but not limited to, using someone else's payment method, suspected fraud, missing membership verification information, or other internal policy reasons.
Payment Methods: Entered payment information must match the cardholder’s data. Customers are responsible for providing accurate data and any additional info requested to avoid cancellation.
Fraud Cases: EngoyGames may cancel any suspected fraudulent order without providing an explanation.

Promotions and Loyalty Programs: EngoyGames may create and apply discounts, vouchers, or benefits. Usage is subject to the terms of each offer. The "DaleelStars" loyalty program allows eligible customers to earn or redeem points. Policies may be updated at any time.

digitalOrders.title: Digital Orders and Delivery
items: Modify Order: Orders cannot be modified after confirmation. Please ensure data accuracy before confirming.
Order Cancellation by Customer: Due to the nature of digital products, the order cannot be canceled after confirmation.
Digital Delivery: After purchase and payment confirmation, the digital product is delivered directly in the customer's account and may also be sent via registered email as per delivery policies.
Non-Refundable and Non-Exchangeable: Products cannot be refunded or exchanged after purchase except in case of a defect in the original code.
Customer Responsibility: Once the code appears in the account or is delivered, the customer is fully responsible for using and safeguarding it.
Code Expiry: EngoyGames is not responsible for codes that expire before use.

vouchers.title: EngoyGames Vouchers
items: When using vouchers, EngoyGames reserves the right to suspend or deactivate the account temporarily or permanently if misuse, fraud, or manipulation is suspected.

termsChanges.title: Terms and Conditions Changes
items: EngoyGames reserves the right to change, modify, add, or remove parts of the terms at any time without notice. Changes take effect immediately. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the changes.
